name: E-commerce: Remove Product from Cart

statusDetails.message:
playwright._impl._errors.Error: It looks like you are using Playwright Sync API inside the asyncio loop.
Please use the Async API instead.

description: This test verifies the full process of removing a product from the shopping cart after it has been added.

labels.name: story
labels.value: As a logged-in user, I can remove a product from my cart
